OOC: I managed to drag myself to the computer! Whoohoo! LOL *winces 
as her smile causes the bandage to move* Sorry for the wait ^_^)


"A Title?" Teltoli's eyes widened and her mouth dropped open a 
little. She fell silent, and transformed to her beast mode. Having 
fur helped warm her a little, but it was still fairly cold. Tucking 
her wings across her back, she lowered herself to the ground beside 
Carnage, and rested her chin on her front paws. She gazed into the 
darkened forest, thinking.

"Well I'm certainly not out here for a title. It's not as if I'm 
going to call myself Teltoli SilverWing: Fighter Expert at the end of 
the day" She said the last sentance sarcastically, but the first was 
sincere, with a voice that had undercurrents of hope in it.

The gears in her mind were ticking away as she thought to come up 
with a suitable answer.

"I mean, you have a lot of experiance from what I've seen," She 
turned her gaze towards her friend, still keeping her chin rested on 
her paws "and you've gotten even better through tremendous and bloody 
battles. I don't think I'll ever have that experiance, or even want 
to, but I need to learn how to fight before I get myself killed. And 
then what will bots view me as? 'Poor Teltoli, the teenager who 
wanted to be an adult and only got herself killed through 
foolishness'. That'll be the words on my gravestone if I don't train, 
or at least get better at fighting"

The Fuzor blew out a heavy sigh, and swished her tail gently over the 
ground behind her, getting the silver tip a little dirty. She scowled 
and reminded herself to clean it later on.

"And I don't think I'm going to get a better training out of anyone 
than you"
